original_text: The Lord will cause you to have boils on your bodies. That is what he did to the Egyptians. He will also cause you to have tumours and other bad diseases on your skin. You will not be able to get well again.
korean_text: 여호와께서 애굽의 종기와 치질과 괴혈병과 피부병으로 너를 치시리니 네가 치유 받지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The Lord will cause you to have boils on your bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 당신의 몸에 종기를 생기게 하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what he did to the Egyptians
He will also cause you to have tumours
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 또한 당신에게 종양을 생기게 하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and other bad diseases on your skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 피부에 다른 나쁜 질병들도 생길 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will not be able to get well again
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다시 건강을 회복하지 못할 것입니다
